thread.title: BRIEF-Universal Health International Group Holding Sees Increment In Group FY Loss

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Universal Health International Group Holding Sees Increment In Group FY Loss

organizations.name: brief-universal health international group holding sees increment in group
reuters) - universal health international group holding ltd

text:
Jan 22 (Reuters) - Universal Health International Group Holding Ltd:
* ‍GROUP IS EXPECTED TO RECORD A LOSS FOR TWELVE MONTHS ENDED 31 DECEMBER 2017​
* ‍GROUP IS EXPECTED TO RECORD INCREMENT IN FY LOSS COMPARED WITH CORRESPONDING PERIOD OF LAST YEAR​
* ‍EXPECTED LOSS DUE TO EXPECTED IMPAIRMENT PROVISION FOR GOODWILL ARISING FROM RETAIL AND DISTRIBUTION BUSINESSES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
